query:
WITH entities AS (
                    SELECT *
                    FROM bria_xpubs
                    WHERE account_id = $1 AND name = $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $3 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN bria_xpub_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id, e.sequence
